about_the_game:
¿Ghouls are taking over the world? NO PROBLEM!
Ghoul Fright's service is your safety and returning those pesky Ghouls underground!

Ghoul Fright it's a dark FPS survival beat em up with rogue like elements and destructible environment.
Face creatures of all kinds, from undead to dangerous mafia skeletons with a moustache!
Survive the waves of Ghouls and fight the final boss to clear the location from evil.



Enjoy yourself! Ghoul Fright is 100% physics based, everything is punchable and you can even use ghoul bodies as your advantage, break all kinds of props with secrets, throw explosive devices, set ghouls on fire and even throw them out of the mansion! And after you're done with them, keep hitting them! And have fun with their liveless bodies.. ¿Did you know you can use them as barricades?


Your only goal.. To survive the hordes of Ghouls and defeat their leader to clear the location from darkness!
Lasting in total 3 waves of Ghouls, your best bet is to explore the mansion and beat every living Ghoul you find
with the help of your bare fists, but remember.. Everything with a bit of creativity can chain a reaction of chaos!



Be ready! As you will face very powerful twisted bosses, with only two possible endings "You kick their *** or they kick yours!"

Knockouts!
Look out! Everyone can get knocked out, by punches, explosions or even jumpscared by a spooky ghost!
Being knocked out leaves you at your weakest point, taking more damage from the ground giving the Ghouls a chance
to finally end you! So WAKE UP FAST!

-Everything can be your weapon-
Skeletons can leave trails of bones that you can use as your weapon!
Pickup chairs, tables, kitchen cups and make them deadly as you throw it or use them to hit the foes!

UPGRADES!
¿Faster combos? ¿Explosive Props? ¿A helper CLONE? Lots of cool upgrades to increase your chaos and make sure you survive long enough
against the army of angry ghouls that will get stronger over time!

-Reactions-
¿Is that a Skeleton fighting two Zombies? Ghouls are very stupid, and if they hit each other in accident.. They will fight!!
Use this as your advantage to clear other areas full of Ghouls while these guys fight against each other.
